EmailTemplate.name: TurboWest 2015.Event Reminder - Registered
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Information: TurboFest West
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-west-registration?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbowest_2015&utm_content=invite>
Friday, February 13th 2015 | 8:00 a.m.
The Omni Hotel San Francisco
500 California Street, San Francisco, CA 94104
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}}
We cannot wait to host you and your colleagues at Turbofest West. Our itinerary features presentations from VMTurbo's founders, executives, and engineers, as well as from companies such as: OpenStack, CoreOS, HP, Arista Networks and Pure Storage.
VMTurbo is also offering FREE product training sessions (valued at $1,785) at the Omni Hotel exclusively for Turbofest West attendees. Click here <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/TurboWest> to sign up for a free training session.
Questions? Email marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto: marketing@vmturbo.com&subject=Octurbofest Question>
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
